name: Octan
overview: The last demon of Octan is giving you a lot of trouble and you have set out across the broiling vapour seas in the eight planes of his world to destroy him. Your ship is armed to the teeth with lasers and missiles and can also be supercharged with shields, nuke blasts and shock waves. Take on his minions, attack his Mammoth demon servants, then, with all your might, face him.
